Wristwatch with built-in voice recorder: This wristwatch will have a built-in voice recorder that allows users to record voice memos and set reminders. Users can also use voice commands to set the time, date, and alarms.

Wristwatch with GPS tracking: This wristwatch will have GPS tracking capabilities that allow users to track their location and route. Users can also set up virtual boundaries and receive notifications when they cross them.

Wristwatch with heart rate monitor: This wristwatch will have a built-in heart rate monitor that tracks the user's heart rate throughout the day. Users can use this information to monitor their fitness and overall health.
Wristwatch with wireless charging: This wristwatch will have wireless charging capabilities, allowing users to charge their watch without the need for cables.

Wristwatch with interchangeable straps: This wristwatch will have interchangeable straps, allowing users to switch between different styles and colors. Users can also personalize their watch by adding engravings or other custom designs.
